Description.Name: Improved Library
Description.Details: Active subscriptions to a variety of e-book services, periodicals, and tri-vid channels make the library even more appealing to everyone. The improved Library adds +2 to Crew Morale.

AssignedCastDescription: A JumpShip pilot told me there's an off-the-books digital distribution service. They get tri-vid and books from DropShips and sell them under the table. It would be more interesting than the decade-old 'Mech magazines Yang keeps putting in the library, anyway.
